name: Asha-Kiran Shelters Foundation

address: Flat No.1, Rajaram Apts, South Main Rd

briefDescription: Asha-Kiran Shelters Foundation works for the welfare of the Underpriviliged people in the District of Pune, with children being our concern area. With more then 2000 benefeciaries covering various areas like Education, Health, capacity building, women empowerment etc. Our Projects being Shelter Home, Community Development,Creche/School for children of Construction labours. Child Labour rehabilitation program and Advocacy.
